content: Chuck SFE 2-A12 drill driver ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for drill drivers and screwdrivers- - ### FEATURES:Features Combinable – you can attach any of the other chucks to the right-angle adapter for drilling and driving in spaces where the tool body would not reach otherwise Applications For use with the SFE 2-A12 multi-head installation drill driver ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: SFE 2-A12 Product information: 13 mm (1/2”) keyless chuck – standard drill chuck for HSS, auger and spade bits, etc. Technical Data | For use with | SFE 2-A12 | Product information | 13 mm (1/2”) keyless chuck – standard drill chuck for HSS, auger and spade bits, etc. ### ITEMS- 2241374 - Chuck SFE 2-A12 drill driver - Package Size 1 pc
